channel.title: New BD class idea: Librarian
channel.description:
BD: Librarian Investigative class Day ability: Quiet Down: only the Librarian can speak for 10 seconds, anonymously (2 uses) Night abilities: Messenger: Send a secret note to up to three players that they recieve at the beginning of the next day. (infinite uses) Document Glance: Read the journal of a player (3 uses) Expose: show the court a player's journal: 1 use
Unseen: Archivist Social class Day ability: Scold: Silence a player for 30 seconds (2 uses) Night abilities: Misplaced Information: Targetted player does not get feedback from their abilities. (infinite uses) Archive scroll: Delete a player's log: (1 uses)
Cult: Seeker
We already have a library not in use as someone's room for use a death screen. This idea came about from seeing the Marshal's ability to read journals of other players and wanting to see more of it.
